reviewText: Engaging romance set in 1939 England. Textbook writer marries on the rebound after being dumped by his fiancee, but then she returns to England after marriage and a three-year absence having realized shed made a mistake. This is a bittersweet and intelligent story with first-rate acting from Walter Pidgeon and Deborah Kerr, and all others, actually. (A young Janet Leigh plays a significant part in this film.) This is not a sappy romance but a gritty tale with many plot twists. Its a wonderful view if you're in the mood for a roller coaster romance.
